prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with large wings and a friendly expression.
Generate a water-type creature that resembles a dragon but has a playful demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that has an orange body and green wings, showcasing its flying abilities.
Show me a mythical creature that combines dragon and flying features with a vibrant color palette.
Imagine a Pokemon with a round body, short limbs, and a dragon-like tail, ready for adventure.
Design a strong yet gentle Pokemon that embodies the essence of dragon and flying types.
Give me a unique Pokemon with a blend of orange and cream colors, perfect for a forest habitat.
